description: The image shows a bathroom scene with a sink, faucet, toilet paper, and a trash can. The sink and faucet are located on the upper right side of the image, with the faucet slightly to the left of the sink. The toilet paper is placed on the left side of the image, near the bottom. The trash can is located at the bottom center of the image, with the toilet paper inside it.
